website_summaries.verdict: Beloved penguins appear to revel in the sparkly snowfall as the globe plays "Let It Snow.
pros: A good size at 5.75 inches, this well-made globe has a heft to it, with thick glass
The tune adds a nice touch
Makes a great gift for Christmas and winter birthdays, or for anyone fond of penguins
cons: Some people who bought it as a gift were loath to part with it
A few found some defects in the figurines

customer_reviews.title: Just Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I like snow globes and I have several that I received as gifts. I love them all. I needed a gift for my sister-in-law for Christmas. What better gift than a snow globe? Well I was a little worried what I would end up with but I have to say this is a beautiful globe. It's well made, the music is great, I love the sparkly snow! I'm very tempted to keep this lovely thing for my collection, but better go ahead and gift it. BUT I WANT IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Rellis

customer_reviews.title: Great, however...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it but the penguin's nose is chipped.
customer_reviews.author: Tess R

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my daughter for Christmas. It's still on display in February. The product is well constructed. Penguins are painted well. Snow falls softly. No glitter. Hooray! Lovely tune. Just wish it played longer.
customer_reviews.author: BW-MO

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken "adorable penguins"
customer_reviews.text: Discovered on Christmas Day whe gift was opened. Good news is that was returned without hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Doggerman

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this snow globe penguin family and knew that my 11 yr old nephew would of loved it. Was so disappointed when I received it and realized it was damaged when I saw the penguins floating instead of standing. There was not much snow either. It was cheaply made! Amazon was amazing in dealing with the situation I must say!
customer_reviews.author: silverfox

customer_reviews.title: she loved it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves penguins, I got this for her for Christmas, she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Deby

customer_reviews.title: Precious penguins!
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived broken, but I returned it and new one was sent promptly upon request. It was a Christmas gift for my grand daughter and she loved it! Loved the penguins!

customer_reviews.title: Very nice snow globe

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Snow Globes

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I collect snow globes and this is now my favourite !!!!! Its much nicer than the picture - the baby is so cute -plays wonderful music clearly - I am sooooo happy with this purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Penguib Snow Globe

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for penguin lover
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for penguin lover. Nice wood base, carefully sculpted figures. Melody not these best, tho. i would have preferred something more classical. Otherwise great!

customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a present and it's adorable! Sent it to Montana and it froze in transit so they are thawing it out.

customer_reviews.title: This is a well made snow globe.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift but I did open it before I gifted it and it is really a nice water globe. It is very well made with no bubble. The snow falls slowly so it last a little longer than some other globes I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Olberding

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful! The sound is good... It's a gift so I won't know how it holds up until the next year I see it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Abit

customer_reviews.title: The snow globe arrived in fine condition including the music box
customer_reviews.text: The snow globe arrived in fine condition including the music box. I was so pleased to find it for my 12-year-old granddaughter, She had received the same globe several years ago as a gift from me and was heartbroken when it was dropped and broken. She was delighted to receive this one for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieKauff

customer_reviews.title: Sounds lovely.
customer_reviews.text: I like the musical portion of the snow globe. It could stand a bit more snow. Very well packaged and promptly delivered.

customer_reviews.title: made my wife happy
customer_reviews.text: She loves the snow globes and this is a very well made one.

customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coolest snow globe ever!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the coolest snow globe ever. Given as a gift to my Mom who loved it and kept it on display all winter. Its a favorite when my young niece comes to visit too.

customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box to see what it looked like and I noticed inside the snow globe that there’s a bubble . It looks like it wasn’t filled up all the way which is very disappointing.

product_meta.title: WHAT ON EARTH Musical Snow Globe - Adorable Penguins - Plays Let It Snow
product_meta.description: An unexpectedly charming musical snow globe. A group of realistic-looking penguins gather together on an icy perch while the music box in the base plays "Let it Snow". Penguins and base are resin; globe is glass. Measures 5 3/4" high X 4" diameter.
feature_bullets: Surprisingly funny, plays "Let it Snow" while penguins bask in snowfall
You'll love the lifelike and exquisitely detailed figurines - noticeable at 5 3/4" high X 4" diameter
The thick glass globe adds a pleasing weight and sparkle to the piece
Sits on a sturdy resin base for long-lasting durability
Perfect holiday gift for penguin lovers, adults and children alike

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars218 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
